articles.title: Peter Xue
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
Email: peterxue1024@stu.pku.edu.cn.
I’m Peter Xue, currently a master’s student at Peking University HSBC Business School. I am from Shanghai, China. My Chinese name is 鎔荔(Rongli).
